turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there how can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, can you make an order for me at Bella Luna Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing how many?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want two large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The first one, I want garlic and onions, and the second one I want ham and meatball. And can I get extra cheese on the garlic and onion one?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 large gluten free pizzas, one garlic and onions with extra cheese and one ham and meatball pizza right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I don't want gluten-free.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I just want two large pizzas, one with garlic and onions and extra cheese, and one with ham and meatball.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Whoops, I've removed that from the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool. Can you summarize my order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 large pizzas, one garlic and onions with extra cheese and one ham and meatball pizza right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much is it going to be?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total is $48.99 and it'll take 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Did Did you place it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, you'll get the reciept via mobile in a just amoment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. I think we're all set, then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, take care.
